GV05agsas_4u:2: tasyaitatyāgamārthasyādvaitadarśanasya pratipakṣabhūtā dvaitino vaināśikāśca teṣāṃ cānyonyavirodādrāgadveṣādikleśāspadaṃ darśanamiti mithyādarśanatvaṃ sūcitam /
GV05agsas_4u:10: jñeyābhinnena saṃbuddhas taṃ vande dvipadāṃ varam // MandUpK_4.1 //
GV05agsas_4u:17_1: jñānaṃ tena jñeyābhinnena jñānenākāśakalpena jñeyātmasvarūpāvyatiriktena gaganopamāndharmānyaḥ
GV05agsas_4u:18: ayameveśvaro yo nārāyaṇākhyastaṃ vande 'bhivādaye dvipadāṃ varaṃ dvipadopalakṣitānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ varaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣottamamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:19: upadeṣṭṛnamaskāramukhena jñānajñeyajñātṛbhedarahitaṃ paramārthadarśanamiha prakaraṇe pratipipādayiṣitaṃ pratipakṣapratiṣedhadvāreṇa pratijñātaṃ bhavati //1//
GV05agsas_4u:24: avivādo 'viruddhaś ca deśitas taṃ namāmy aham // MandUpK_4.2 //
GV05agsas_4u:27: sparśanaṃ sparśaḥ sambandho na vidyate yasya yogasya kenacitkadācidapi sa asparśayogo brahmasvabhāva eva,
GV05agsas_4u:34_0: tatheha bhavati kaścidviṣayopabhogaḥ sukho na hito 'yaṃ tu sukho hitaśca nityamapracalitasvabhāvatvāt
GV05agsas_4u:34_1: kiṃ cāvivādo viruddha vadanaṃ vivādaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraheṇa yasminna vidyate sa avivādaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:36: ya īdṛśo yogo deśita upadiṣṭaḥ śāstreṇa taṃ namāmyahaṃ praṇamāmītyarthaḥ //2//
GV05agsas_4u:40: bhūtasya jātim icchanti vādinaḥ kecid eva hi /
GV05agsas_4u:44: bhūtasya vidyamānasya vastuno jātimutpattimicchanti vādinaḥ kecideva hi sāṃkhyā na sarvaṃ eva dvaitinaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:45: yasmādabhūtasyāvidyamānasyāpare vaiśeṣikā naiyāyikāśca dhīrā dhīmantaḥ prajñābhimānina ityartho vivadanto viruddhaṃ vadanto hyanyenyamicchanti jetumityabhiprāyaḥ //3//
GV05agsas_4u:48: tairevaṃ viruddhavadanenānyonyapakṣapratiṣedhaṃ kurvadbhiḥ kiṃ khyāpitaṃ bhavatyucyate-
GV05agsas_4u:49: bhūtaṃ na jāyate kiñcid abhūtaṃ naiva jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:50: vivadanto 'dvayā hy evam ajātiṃ khyāpayanti te // MandUpK_4.4 //
GV05agsas_4u:53: bhūtaṃ vidyamānaṃ vastu na jāyate kiñcidvidyamānatvādevātmavadityevaṃ vadannasadvādī sāṃkhyapakṣaṃ pratiṣedhati sajjanma /
GV05agsas_4u:55: vivadanto viruddhaṃ vadanto 'dvayā advaitino hyete 'nyonyasya pakṣau sadasatorjanmanī pratiṣedhanto 'jātimanutpattimarthātkhyāpayanti prakāśayanti te //4//
GV05agsas_4u:59: vivadāmo na taiḥ sārdham avivādaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_4.5 //
GV05agsas_4u:62: tairevaṃ khyāpyamānāmajātimevamastvityanumodāmahe kevalaṃ na taiḥ sārdhaṃ vivadāmaḥ pakṣapratipakṣagrahaṇena;
GV05agsas_4u:68: ajāto hy amṛto dharmo martyatāṃ katham eṣyati // MandUpK_4.6 //
GV05agsas_4u:74: na bhavaty amṛtaṃ martyaṃ na martyam amṛtaṃ tathā /
GV05agsas_4u:75: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.7 //
GV05agsas_4u:77: kṛtakenāmṛtas tasya kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalaḥ // MandUpK_4.8 //
GV05agsas_4u:85: sāṃsiddhikī svābhāvikī sahajā akṛtā ca yā /
GV05agsas_4u:86: prakṛtiḥ seti vijñeyā svabhāvaṃ na jahāti yā // MandUpK_4.9 //
GV05agsas_4u:89: samyaksiddhiḥ saṃsiddhistatra bhavā sāṃsiddhikī yathā yogināṃ siddhānām aṇimādyaiśvaryaprāptiḥ prakṛtiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:90: sā bhūtabhaviṣyatkālayorapi yogināṃ na viparyeti tathaiva sā /
GV05agsas_4u:91: tathā svābhāvikī dravyasvabhāvata eva yathāgnyādīnām uṣṇaprakāśādilakṣaṇā,
GV05agsas_4u:92: sāpi na kālāntare vyabhicarati deśāntare ca /
GV05agsas_4u:93: tathā sahajā ātmanā sahaiva jātā yathā pakṣyādīnāmākāśagamanādilakṣaṇā /
GV05agsas_4u:94: anyāpi yā kācidakṛtā kenacinna kṛtā yatāpāṃ nimnadeśagamanādilakṣaṇā /
GV05agsas_4u:95: anyāpi yā kājitsvabhāvaṃ na jahāti sā sarvā prakṛtiriti vijñeyā loke /
GV05agsas_4u:96: mithyākalpiteṣu laukikeṣvapi vastuṣu prakṛtirnānyathā bhavati kimutājasvabhāveṣu paramārthavastuṣvamṛtatvalakṣaṇā prakṛtirnānyathā bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ //9//
GV05agsas_4u:99: kiṃviṣayā punaḥ sā prakṛtiryasyā anyathābhāvo vādibhiḥ kalpyate kalpanāyāṃ vā ko doṣa ityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:105: ke ? sarve dharmāḥ sarva ātmāna ityetatsvabhāvataḥ prakṛtitaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:106: evaṃsvabhāvāḥ santo dharmājarāmaraṇamicchanta icchanta ivecchantorajjvāmiva sarpamātmani kalpayantaścyavante svabhāvataścalantītyarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:111: kāraṇaṃ yasya vai kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:112: jāyamānaṃ katham ajaṃ bhinnaṃ nityaṃ kathaṃ ca tat // MandUpK_4.11 //
GV05agsas_4u:115: kāraṇaṃ mṛdvadupādānalakṣaṇaṃ yasya vādino vai kāryaṃ kāraṇameva kāryākāreṇa pariṇamate yasya vādina ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:116: tasyājameva satprādhānādi kāraṇaṃ mahadādikāryarūpeṇa jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:117: mahadādyākāreṇa cejjāyamānaṃ pradhānaṃ kathamajamucyate tairvipratiṣiddhaṃ cedaṃ jāyate 'jaṃ ceti /
GV05agsas_4u:118: nityaṃ ca tairucyate pradhānaṃ bhinnaṃ vidīrṇaṃ sphuṭitamekadeśena satkathaṃ nityaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:119: na hi sāvayavaṃ ghaṭādy ekadeśasphuṭanadharmi nityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ loka ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:120: vidīrṇaṃ ca syādekadeśenājaṃ nityaṃ cety etadvipratiṣiddhaṃ tairabhidhīyata ityabhiprāyaḥ //11//
GV05agsas_4u:124: kāraṇād yady ananyatvam ataḥ kāryam ajaṃ yadi /
GV05agsas_4u:125: jāyamānād dhi vai kāryāt kāraṇaṃ te kathaṃ dhruvam // MandUpK_4.12 //
GV05agsas_4u:128: kāraṇādajātkāryasya yadyananyatvamiṣṭaṃ tvayā tataḥ kāryamajamiti prāptam /
GV05agsas_4u:130: kiṃ cānyatkāryakāraṇayonanyatve jāyamānāddhi vai kāryakāraṇamananyannityaṃ dhruvaṃ ca te kathaṃ bhavet /
GV05agsas_4u:131: na hi kukkuṭyā ekadeśaḥ pacyata ekadeśaḥ prasavāya kalpyate //12//
GV05agsas_4u:135: ajād vai jāyate yasya dṛṣṭāntas tasya nāsti vai /
GV05agsas_4u:136: jātāc ca jāyāmānasya na vyavasthā prasajyate // MandUpK_4.13 //
GV05agsas_4u:139: ajādanutpannādvastuno jāyate yasya vādinaḥ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭānttastasya nāsti vai,
GV05agsas_4u:141: yadā punarjātājjāyamānasya vastuno 'bhyupagamas tadapyanyasmāj jātāttadapyanyasmāditi na vyāvasthā prasajyate /
GV05agsas_4u:148: hetor ādiḥ phalaṃ yeṣām ādir hetuḥ phalasya ca /
GV05agsas_4u:149: hetoḥ phalasya cānādiḥ kathaṃ tair upavarṇyate // MandUpK_4.14 //
GV05agsas_4u:152: hetordharmāderādiḥ kāraṇaṃ dehādisaṃghātaḥ phalaṃ yeṣāṃ vādinām /
GV05agsas_4u:153: tathādiḥ kāraṇaṃ heturdharmādharmādiḥ phalasya ca dehādisaṃghātasya /
GV05agsas_4u:154: evaṃ hetuphalayoritaretarakāryakāraṇatvenādimattvaṃ bruvadbhirevaṃ hetoḥ phalasya cānāditvaṃ kathaṃ tairupavarṇyate?
GV05agsas_4u:156: na hi nityasya kūṭasthasyātmano hetuphalātmatā sambhavati //14//
GV05agsas_4u:160: hetor ādiḥ phalaṃ yeṣām ādir hetuḥ kalasya ca /
GV05agsas_4u:161: tathā janma bhavet teṣāṃ putrāj janma pitur yathā // MandUpK_4.15 //
GV05agsas_4u:164: hetujanyādeva phalāddhetorjanmābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāmīdṛśo virodha ukto bhavati yathā putrājjanma pituḥ //15//
GV05agsas_4u:179: phalād utpadyamānaḥ san na te hetuḥ prasidhyati /
GV05agsas_4u:180: aprasiddhaḥ kathaṃ hetuḥ phalam utpādayiṣyati // MandUpK_4.17 //
GV05agsas_4u:183: janyātsvato 'labdhātmakāt phalādutpadyamānaḥ sañśaśaviṣāṇāderivāsato na hetuḥ prasidhyati janma na labhate /
GV05agsas_4u:185: na hītaretarāpekṣasiddhyoḥ śaśaviṣāṇakalpayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena saṃbandhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:189: yadi hetoḥ phalāt siddhiḥ phalasiddhiś ca hetutaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:190: katarat pūrvaniṣpannaṃ yasya siddhir apekṣayā // MandUpK_4.18 //
GV05agsas_4u:193_1: eva tvayā kataratpūrvaniṣpannaṃ hetuphalayoryasya paścādbhāvinaḥ siddhiḥ syātpūrvasiddhyapekṣayā
GV05agsas_4u:198: evaṃ hi sarvathā buddhair ajātiḥ paridīpitā // MandUpK_4.19 //
GV05agsas_4u:202: atha vā yo 'yaṃ tvayoktaḥ kramo hetoḥ phalasya siddhiḥ phalācca hetoḥ siddhiritītaretarānantaryalakṣaṇastasya kopo viparyāso 'nyathābhāvaḥ syādityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:203: evaṃ hetuphalayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvānupapatterajātiḥ sarvasyānutpattiḥ paridīpitā prakāśitānyonyapakṣadoṣaṃ bruvadbhirvādibhirbuddhaiḥ paṇḍitairityarthaḥ //19//
GV05agsas_4u:206: nanu hetulayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva ityasmābhiruktaṃ śabdamātramāśritya cchalamidaṃ tvayoktaṃ putrājjanma pituryathā,
GV05agsas_4u:211: bījāṅkurākhyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sadā sādhyasamo hi sa /
GV05agsas_4u:212: na hi sādhyasamo hetuḥ siddhau sādhyasya yujyate // MandUpK_4.20 //
GV05agsas_4u:215: bījāṅkurākhyā dṛṣṭānto yaḥ sa sādhyena tulyo mametyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:219: evaṃ pūrvaḥ pūrvo 'ṅkuro bījaṃ ca pūrvaṃ pūrvamādimadeviti pratyekaṃ sarvasya bījāṅkurajātasyādimattvātkasyacidapyanāditvānupapatti /
GV05agsas_4u:223: na hi bījāṅkuravyatirekeṇa bījāṅkurasantatirnāmaikābhyupagamyate hetuphalasantatirvā tadanāditvavādibhis tasmātsūktaṃ hetoḥ phalasya cānādiḥ kathaṃ tairupavarṇyata iti /
GV05agsas_4u:225: na ca loke sādhyasamo hetuḥ sādhyasiddhau siddhinimittaṃ prayujyate pramāṇakuśalairityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:233: jāyamānād dhi vai dharmāt kathaṃ pūrvaṃ na gṛhyate // MandUpK_4.21 //
GV05agsas_4u:246: svato vā parato vāpi na kiñcid vastu jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:247: sad asat sadasad vāpi na kiñcid vastu jāyate // MandUpK_4.22 //
GV05agsas_4u:250: svataḥ parata ubhayato vā sadasatsadasadvā na jāyate na tasya kenacidapi prakāreṇa janma saṃbhavati /
GV05agsas_4u:251: na tāvatsvayamevāpariniṣpannātsvataḥ svarūpātsvayameva jāyate yathā ghaṭastasmādeva ghaṭāt /
GV05agsas_4u:254: virodhāt; yathā ghaṭapaṭābhyāṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭo vā na jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:255: nanu mṛdo ghaṭo jāyate pituśca putraḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:256: satyam, asti jāyata iti pratyayaḥ śabdaśca mūḍhānām /
GV05agsas_4u:257: tāveva śabdapratyayau vivekibhiḥ parīkṣyete kiṃ satyameva tāvuta mṛṣeti /
GV05agsas_4u:258: yāvatā parīkṣyamāṇe śabdapratyaviṣayaṃ vastu ghaṭaputrādilakṣaṇaṃ śabdamātrameva tat /
GV05agsas_4u:263: ato na kiñcadvastu jāyata iti siddham /
GV05agsas_4u:264: yeṣāṃ punarjanireva jāyata iti kriyākārakaphalaikatvam abhyupagamyate kṣaṇikatvaṃ ca vastunaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:269: kiṃ ca hetuphalayoranāditvamabhyupagacchatā tvayā balāddhetuphalayorajanmaivābhyupagataṃ syāt /
GV05agsas_4u:271: hetur na jāyate 'nādeḥ phalaṃ cāpi svabhāvataḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:272: ādir na vidyate yasya tasya hy ādir na vidyate // MandUpK_4.23 //
GV05agsas_4u:277: phalaṃ cādirahitādanāderhetorajātsvabhāvata eva nirnimittaṃ jāyata iti nābhyupagamyate /
GV05agsas_4u:279: yasmādādiḥ kāraṇaṃ na vidyate yasya loke tasya hyādiḥ pūrvoktā jātirna vidyate /
GV05agsas_4u:289: nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ viṣaya ityetatsannimittatvaṃ saviṣatvaṃ svātmavyatiriktaviṣayatetyetat pratijānīmahe /
GV05agsas_4u:290: na hi nirviṣayā prajñaptiḥ śabdādipratītiḥ syāt,
GV05agsas_4u:292: anyathā nirviṣayatve śabdasparśanīlapītalohitādipratyayavaicitryasya dvayasya nāśato nāśo 'bhāvaḥ prasajyetetyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:296: tasya paratantrasya paratantrāśrayasya bāhyārthasya jñānavyatiriktasyāsthitā matābhipretā /
GV05agsas_4u:297: na hi prajñapteḥ prakāśamātrasvarūpāyā nīlapītādibāhyālambanavaicitryamantareṇa svabhāvabhedenaiva vaicitryaṃ saṃbhavati /
GV05agsas_4u:298: sphaṭikasyeva nīlādyupādhyāśrayairvinā vaicitryaṃ na ghaṭata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:302: yadyagnyādibāhyaṃ dāhādinimittaṃ vijñānavyatiriktaṃ na syāttato dāhādiduḥkhaṃ nopalabhyate /
GV05agsas_4u:320: na hi ghaṭo yathābhūtamṛdrūpadarśane sati tadvyatirekeṇāsti,
GV05agsas_4u:326: tadabhāve 'bhāvān na hi suṣuptasamāhitamuktānāṃ bhrāntidarśanābhāva ātmavyatirikto bāhyor'tha upalabhyate /
GV05agsas_4u:332: cittaṃ na saṃspṛśaty arthaṃ nārthābhāsaṃ tathaiva ca /
GV05agsas_4u:333: abhūto hi yataś cārtho nārthābhāsas tataḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_4.26 //
GV05agsas_4u:338: abhūto hi jāgarite 'pi svapnārthavadeva bāhyaḥ śabdādyartho yata uktahetutvācca /
GV05agsas_4u:345: nimittaṃ na sadā cittaṃ saṃspṛśaty adhvasu triṣu /
GV05agsas_4u:346: animitto viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.27 //
GV05agsas_4u:349: nimittaṃ viṣayamatītānāgatavartamānādhvasu triṣvapi sadā cittaṃ na spṛśedeva hi /
GV05agsas_4u:350: yadi hi kvacit saṃspṛśet sa aviparyāsaḥ paramārtha iti /
GV05agsas_4u:351: atastadapekṣayāsati ghaṭe ghaṭādyābhāsatā viparyāsaḥ syānna tu tadasti kadācidapi cittasyārthasaṃsparśanam /
GV05agsas_4u:352: tasmādanimitto viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ tasya cittasya bhaviṣyati;
GV05agsas_4u:354: ayameva hi svabhāvaścittasya yadutāsati nimitte ghaṭādau tadvadavabhāsanam //27//
GV05agsas_4u:359: tasmān na jāyate cittaṃ cittadṛśyaṃ na jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:360: tasya paśyanti ye jātiṃ khe vai paśyanti te padam // MandUpK_4.28 //
GV05agsas_4u:363: yasmādasatyeva ghaṭādau ghaṭādyābhāsatā cittasya vijñānavādinābhyupagatā tadanumoditam asmābhirapi bhūtadarśanāt,
GV05agsas_4u:364: tasmāttasyāpi cittasya jāyamānāvabhāsatāsatyeva janmani yuktā bhavitumityato na jāyate cittam,
GV05agsas_4u:366: atastasya cittasya ye jātiṃ paśyanti vijñānavādinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaduḥkhitvaśūnyatvānātmatvādi ca,
GV05agsas_4u:367: tenaiva cittena cittasvarūpaṃ draṣṭumaśakyaṃ paśyantaḥ khe vai paśyanti te padaṃ pakṣyādīnām /
GV05agsas_4u:368_0: ata itarebhyo 'pi dvaitibhyo 'tyantasāhasikā ityartho ye 'pi śūnyavādinaḥ paśyanta
GV05agsas_4u:368_1: eva sarvaśūnyatāṃ svadarśanasyāpi śūnyatāṃ svadarśanasyāpi śūnyatāṃ pratijānate te
GV05agsas_4u:371: uktairhetubhirajamekaṃ brahmeti siddhaṃ yatpunarādau pratijñātaṃ tatphalopasaṃhārārthoyaṃ ślokaḥ-
GV05agsas_4u:372: ajātaṃ jāyate yasmād ajātiḥ prakṛtis tataḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:373: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.29 //
GV05agsas_4u:376: ajātaṃ yaccittaṃ brahmaiva jāyata iti vādibhiḥ parikalpyate tadajātaṃ jāyate yasmādajātiḥ prakṛtistasya /
GV05agsas_4u:380: ayaṃ cāpara ātmanaḥ saṃsāramokṣayoḥ paramārthasadbhāvavādināṃ doṣa ucyate-
GV05agsas_4u:381: anāder antavattvaṃ ca saṃsārasya na setsyati /
GV05agsas_4u:382: anantatā cādimato mokṣasya na bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.30 //
GV05agsas_4u:385: anāderatītakoṭirahitasya saṃsārasyāntavattvaṃ samāptirna setsyati yuktitaḥ siddhiṃ nopayāsyati /
GV05agsas_4u:396: ādāvante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GV05agsas_4u:397: vitathaiḥ sadṛśāḥ santo 'vitathā iva lakṣitāḥ // MandUpK_4.31 //
GV05agsas_4u:399: tasmād ādyantavattvena mithyaiva khalu te smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_4.32 //
GV05agsas_4u:406: saṃvṛtte 'smin pradeśe vai bhūtānāṃ darśanaṃ kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.33 //
GV05agsas_4u:411: na yuktaṃ darśanaṃ gatvā kālasyāniyamād gatau /
GV05agsas_4u:412: pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvas tasmin deśe na vidyate // MandUpK_4.34 //
GV05agsas_4u:415: jāgarite gatyāgamanakālo niyato deśaḥ pramāṇato yastasyā niyamānniyamasyābhāvātsvapne na deśāntarāgamanamityarthaḥ //34//
GV05agsas_4u:418: mitrādyaiḥ saha saṃmantrya saṃbuddhau na prapadyate /
GV05agsas_4u:419: gṛhītaṃ cāpi yat kiñcit pratibuddho na paśyati // MandUpK_4.35 //
GV05agsas_4u:422: mitrādyaiḥ saha saṃmantrya tadeva mantraṇaṃ pratibuddhau na prapadyate /
GV05agsas_4u:427: svapne cāvastukaḥ kāyaḥ pṛthag anyasya darśanāt /
GV05agsas_4u:428: yathā kāyas tathā sarvaṃ cittadṛśyam avastukam // MandUpK_4.36 //
GV05agsas_4u:431: svapne cāṭandṛśyate yaḥ kāyaḥ sa avastukastato 'nyasya svāpadeśastasya pṛthakkāyāntarasya darśanāt /
GV05agsas_4u:432: yathā svapnadṛśyaḥ kāyo 'saṃstathā sarvaṃ cittadṛśyamavastukaṃ jāgarite 'pi cittadṛśyatvādityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:438: tad dhetutvāt tu tasyaiva sajjāgaritam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.37 //
GV05agsas_4u:441: jāgaritavajjāgaritasye7va grahaṇādgrāhyagrāhakarūpeṇāsvapnasya tajjāgaritaṃ heturasya svapnasya sa svapnastaddhetujāgaritakāryamiṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:442: taddhetutvājjāgaritakāryatvāttasyaiva svapnadṛśya eva sajjāgaritaṃ na tvanyeṣām /
GV05agsas_4u:444_0: yathā svapnaḥ svapnadṛśya eva sansādhāraṇavidyamānavastuvadavabhāsate tathā tatkāraṇatvātsādhāraṇavidyamānavastuvadavabhāsamānaṃ
GV05agsas_4u:448: atyantacalo hi svapno jāgaritaṃ tu sthiraṃ lakṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:450: vivekināṃ tu na kasyacidvastuna utpādaḥ prasiddhe 'taḥ-
GV05agsas_4u:452: na ca bhūtād abhūtasya saṃbhavo 'sti kathañcana // MandUpK_4.38 //
GV05agsas_4u:455: aprasiddhatvādutpādasyātmaiva sarvamityajaṃ sarvamudāhṛtaṃ vedānteṣu“sabāhyābhyantaro hyajaḥ“(mu.u.2 / 1 / 2) iti /
GV05agsas_4u:456: yadyapi manyase jāgaritāstato 'satsvapno jāyata iti tadasat /
GV05agsas_4u:458: na hyasataḥ śaśaviṣāṇādeḥ sambhavo dṛṣṭaḥ kathañcidapi //38//
GV05agsas_4u:461: nanūktaṃ tvayaiva svapno jāgaritakāryamiti tatkathamutpādo 'prasiddha ityucyate?
GV05agsas_4u:463: asaj jāgarite dṛṣṭvā svapne paśyati tanmayaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:464: asatsvapne 'pi dṛṣṭvā ca pratibuddhau na paśyati // MandUpK_4.39 //
GV05agsas_4u:467: asadavidyamānaṃ rajjusarpadvikalpitaṃ vastu jāgarite dṛṣṭvā tadbhāvabhāvitastanmayaḥ svapne 'pi jāgaritavadgrāhyagrāhakarūpeṇa vikalpayanpaśyati /
GV05agsas_4u:468: tathāsatsvapne 'pi dṛṣṭvā ca pratibuddhau na paśyatyavikalpayan /
GV05agsas_4u:469: ca śabdāttathā jāgarite 'pi dṛṣṭvā svapne na paśyati kadācidityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:470: tasmājjāgaritaṃ svapnaheturucyate na tu paramārthasaditi kṛtvā //39//
GV05agsas_4u:473: paramārthatastu na kasyacitkenacidapi prakāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāva upapadyate katham?-
GV05agsas_4u:475: sac ca saddhetukaṃ nāsti saddhetukam asat kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.40 //
GV05agsas_4u:478: nāstyasaddhetukamasacchaśaviṣāṇādi hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ yasyāsata eva svakusumādestadasaddhatukamasanna vidyate /
GV05agsas_4u:479: tathā sadapi ghaṭādivastv asaddhetukaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādikāryaṃ nāsti /
GV05agsas_4u:480: tathā sacca vidyamānaṃ ghaṭādi vidyamānaghaṭādivastvantarakāryaṃ nāsti /
GV05agsas_4u:482: na cānyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambhavati śakyo vā kalpayitum?
GV05agsas_4u:483: ato vivekināmasiddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kasya cidityabhiprāyaḥ //40//
GV05agsas_4u:487: viparyāsād yathā jāgrad acintyān bhūtavat spṛśet /
GV05agsas_4u:488: tathā svapne viparyāsād dharmāṃs tatraiva paśyati // MandUpK_4.41 //
GV05agsas_4u:491: viparyāsādavivekato yathā jāgrajjāgarite 'cintyānbhāvānaśakyacintanīyān rajjusarpādīn bhūtavatparamārthavatspṛśanniva vikalpayedityarthaḥ kaścidyathā,
GV05agsas_4u:497: jātis tu deśitā buddhair ajātes trasatāṃ sadā // MandUpK_4.42 //
GV05agsas_4u:503: tābhyāṃ hetubhyāmastivastutvavādinām asti vastubhūva ityevaṃ vadanaśīlānāṃ dṛḍhāgrahavatāṃ śraddadhānānāṃ mandavivekināmanarthepāyatvena sā deśitā jātiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:505: vedāntābhyāsināṃ tu svayamevājādvayātmaviṣayo viveko bhaviṣyatīti na tu paramārthabuddhyā /
GV05agsas_4u:506: te hi śrotriyāḥ sthūlabuddhitvādajāter ajātivastunaḥ sadā trasyantyātmanāśaṃ manyamānā avivekina ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:510: ajātes trasatāṃ teṣām upalambhād viyanti ye /
GV05agsas_4u:511: jātidoṣā na setsyanti doṣo 'py alpo bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.43 //
GV05agsas_4u:514: ye caivamupalambhātsamācarāccājāterajātivastunastrasanto 'stivastvityadvayādātmano viyanti viruddhaṃ yanti dvaitaṃ pratipadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:515: teṣāmajātestrasatāṃ śraddhadhānānāṃ sanmārgāvalambināṃ jātidoṣā jātyupalambhakṛtā doṣā na setsyanti siddhiṃ nopayāsyanti,
GV05agsas_4u:525: upalambhāt samācārād asti vastu tathocyate // MandUpK_4.44 //
GV05agsas_4u:528: upalabhyate hi māyāhastī hastīva hastinamivātra samācaranti,
GV05agsas_4u:533: kiṃ punaḥ paramārthasadvastu yadāspadā jātyāhyasadbuddhaya ityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:535: ajācalam avastutvaṃ vijñānaṃ śāntam advayam // MandUpK_4.45 //
GV05agsas_4u:542: vastvābhāsaṃ vastu dravyaṃ dharmi tadvadavabhāsata iti vastvābhāsam /
GV05agsas_4u:543: yathā sa eva devadatto gauro dīrgha iti jāyate devadattaḥ spandate dīrgho gaura ityevamavabhāsate /
GV05agsas_4u:550: evaṃ na jāyate cittam evaṃ dharmā ajāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:551: evam eva vijānanto na patanti viparyaye // MandUpK_4.46 //
GV05agsas_4u:554: evaṃ yathoktebhyo hetubhyo na jāyate cittamevaṃ dharmā ātmano 'jāḥ smṛtā brahmavidbhiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:556: evameva yathoktaṃ vijñānaṃ jātyādirahitamadvayamātmatattvaṃ vijānantastyaktabāhyaiṣaṇāḥ punarnapatantyavidyādhvāntasāgare viparyaye /
GV05agsas_4u:566: yathā hi loka ṛjuvakrādiprakārābhāsamalātaspanditamulkācalanaṃ tathā grahaṇagrāhakābhāsaṃ viṣayiviṣayābhāsamityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:574: aspandamānaṃ vijñānam anābhāsam ajaṃ tathā // MandUpK_4.48 //
GV05agsas_4u:582: alāte spandamāne vai nābhāsā anyato bhuvaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:583: na tato 'nyatra nispandān nālātaṃ praviśanti te // MandUpK_4.49 //
GV05agsas_4u:586: tasminnevālāte spandamāna ṛjuvakrādyābhāsā alātādanyataḥ kutaścidāgatyālāte naiva bhavantī7ti nānyatobhuvaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:596: na nirgatā alātātta ābhāsā gṛhādivaddravyatvābhāvayogato dravyasyabhāvo dravyatvam,
GV05agsas_4u:605: na tato 'nyatra nispandān na vijñānaṃ viśanti te // MandUpK_4.51 //
GV05agsas_4u:614: yathāsatsvṛjvādyābhāseṣv ṛjvādibuddhirdṛṣṭālātamātre tathāstveva jātyādiṣu vijñānamātre jātyādibuddhirmṛṣaiveti samudāyārthaḥ //51-52 //
GV05agsas_4u:617: ajamekamātmatattvamiti sthitaṃ tatra yairapi kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kalpyate teṣām /
GV05agsas_4u:618: dravyaṃ dravyasya hetuḥ syād anyad anyasya caiva hi /
GV05agsas_4u:619: dravyatvam anyabhāvo vā dharmāṇāṃ nopapadyate // MandUpK_4.53 //
GV05agsas_4u:622: dravyaṃ dravyasyānyasyānyaddhetuḥ kāraṇaṃ syānna tu tasyaiva tat /
GV05agsas_4u:624: na ca dravyatvaṃ dharmāṇāmātmānāmupapadyate 'nyatvaṃ vā kutaścidyenānyasya kāraṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ vā pratipadyate /
GV05agsas_4u:628: evaṃ na cittajā dharmāś cittaṃ vāpi na dharmajam /
GV05agsas_4u:632: evaṃ yathoktebhyo hetubhya ātmavijñānasvarūpameva cittamiti na cittajā bāhyadharmā nāpi bāhyadharmajaṃ cittam /
GV05agsas_4u:634: evaṃ na hetoḥ phalaṃ jāyate nāpi phalāddheturiti hetuphalayorajātiṃ hetuphalājātiṃ praviśantyadhyavasyanty ātmani hetuphalayorabhāvameva pratipadyante brahmavida ityarthaḥ //54//
GV05agsas_4u:637: ye punarhetuphalayorabhiniviṣṭāsteṣāṃ kiṃ syādityucyate- dharmādharmākhyasya hetorahaṃ kartā mama dharmādharmau tatphalaṃ kālāntare kvacitprāṇinikāye jāto bhokṣya iti-
GV05agsas_4u:644: yadā punarmantrauṣadhivīryeṇeva grahāveśo yathoktādvaitadaśanenāvidyodbhūtahetuphalāveśo 'panīto bhavati tadā tasminkṣīṇe nāsti hetuphalodbhavaḥ //55//
GV05agsas_4u:649: kṣīṇe hetuphalāveśe saṃsāraṃ na prapadyate // MandUpK_4.56 //
GV05agsas_4u:652: yāvatsamyagdarśanena hetuphalāveśo na nivartate 'kṣīṇaḥ saṃsārastāvadāyato dīrgho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:653: kṣīṇe punarhetiphalāveśe saṃsāraṃ na prapadyate kāraṇābhāvāt //56//
GV05agsas_4u:656: nanvajādātmano 'nyannāstyeva tatkathaṃ hetuphalayoḥ saṃsārasya cotpattivināśāvucyete tvayā?
GV05agsas_4u:658: saṃvṛtyā jāyate sarvaṃ śāśvataṃ nāsti tena vai /
GV05agsas_4u:659: sadbhāvena hy ajaṃ sarvam ucchedas tena nāsti vai // MandUpK_4.57 //
GV05agsas_4u:662: saṃvṛtyā saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvṛtiravidyāviṣayo laukiko vyavahārastā saṃvṛtyā jāyate sarvam /
GV05agsas_4u:669: dharmā ya iti jāyante jāyante te na tattvataḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:670: janma māyopamaṃ teṣāṃ sā ca māyā na vidyate // MandUpK_4.58 //
GV05agsas_4u:673: ye 'pyātmāno 'nye ca dharmā jāyanta iti kalpyante ta ityevaṃ prakārā yathoktā saṃvṛtinirdiśyata iti saṃvṛtyaiva dharmā jāyante;
GV05agsas_4u:675: yatpunastatsaṃvṛtyā janma teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathoktānāṃ yathā māyayā janma tathā tanmāyopamaṃ pratyetavyam /
GV05agsas_4u:677: naivam; sā ca māyā na vidyate,
GV05agsas_4u:683: nāsau nityo na cocchedī tadvad dharmeṣu yojanā // MandUpK_4.59 //
GV05agsas_4u:686_0: yathā māyāmayādbījājjāyate tanmayo māyāmayo 'ṅkuro nāsāṅkuro nityo na cocchedī vināśī
GV05agsas_4u:686_1: vābhūtatvāttadvadeva dharmeṣu janmanāśādiyojanā yuktir na tu paramārthato dharmāṇāṃ
GV05agsas_4u:690: yatra varṇā na vartante vivekas tatra nocyate // MandUpK_4.60 //
GV05agsas_4u:693: paramārthatastvātmasvajeṣu nityaikarasavijñaptimātrasattākeṣu śāśvato 'śāśvata ita vā nābhidhā nābhidhānaṃ pravartata ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:694: yatra yeṣu varṇyante yairarthāste varṇāṃ śabdā na pravartante 'bhidhātuṃ prakāśayituṃ na pravartanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:695: idamevamiti viveko viviktatā tatra nityo 'nitya iti nocyate /
GV05agsas_4u:700: yathā svapne dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ calati māyayā /
GV05agsas_4u:701: tathā jāgrad dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ calati māyayā // MandUpK_4.61 //
GV05agsas_4u:702: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ svapne na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:703: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ tathā jāgran na saṃśayaḥ // MandUpK_4.62 //
GV05agsas_4u:706: yatpunarvāggocaratvaṃ paramārthato 'dvayasya vijñānamātrasya tanmanasaḥ spandanamātraṃ na paramārthata iti /
GV05agsas_4u:711: svapnadṛk pracaran svapne dikṣu vai daśasu sthitān /
GV05agsas_4u:712: aṇḍajān svedajān vāpi jīvān paśyati yān sadā // MandUpK_4.63 //
GV05agsas_4u:715: svapnānpaśyatīti svapnadṛkpracaranparyaṭansvapne svapnasthāne dikṣu vai daśasu sthitānvartamānāñjīvānprāṇino 'ṇḍajānsvedajānvā yānsadā paśyati //63//
GV05agsas_4u:719: svapnadṛkcittadṛśyās te na vidyante tataḥ pṛthak /
GV05agsas_4u:720: tathā tad dṛśyam evedaṃ svapnadṛkcittam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.64 //
GV05agsas_4u:723: svapnadṛśaścittaṃ svapnadṛkcittaṃ tena dṛśyāste jīvāstatastasmātsvapnadṛkcittātpṛthaṅna vidyante na santītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:730: carañ jāgarite jāgrad dikṣu vai daśasu sthitān /
GV05agsas_4u:731: aṇḍajān svedajān vāpi jīvān paśyati yān sadā // MandUpK_4.65 //
GV05agsas_4u:732: jāgrac cittekṣaṇīyās te na vidyante tataḥ pṛthak /
GV05agsas_4u:733: tathā tad dṛśyam evedaṃ jāgrataś cittam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.66 //
GV05agsas_4u:741: ubhe hy anyonyadṛśye te kiṃ tad astīti cocyate /
GV05agsas_4u:742: lakṣaṇāśūnyam ubhayaṃ tan mate naiva gṛhyate // MandUpK_4.67 //
GV05agsas_4u:749: tasmānna kiñcidastīti cocyate cittaṃ vā cittekṣaṇīyaṃ vā kiṃ tadastīti vivekinocyate /
GV05agsas_4u:750: na hi svapne hastī hasticittaṃ vā vidyate tathehāpi vivekināmityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:751: katham? lakṣaṇāśūnyaṃ lakṣyate 'nayeti lakṣaṇā pramāṇaṃ pramāṇaśūnyamubhayaṃ cittaṃ caityaṃ dvayaṃ yatastanmatenaiva taccittatayaiva tadgṛhyate /
GV05agsas_4u:752: na hi ghaṭamatiṃ pratyākhyāya ghaṭo gṛhyate nāpi ghaṭaṃ pratyākhyāya ghaṭamatiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:753: na hi tatra pramāṇaprameyabhedaḥ śakyate kalpayitumityabhiprāyaḥ //67//
GV05agsas_4u:756: yathā svapnamayo jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05agsas_4u:757: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.68 //
GV05agsas_4u:758: yathā māyāmayo jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05agsas_4u:759: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.69 //
GV05agsas_4u:760: yathā nirmitako jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05agsas_4u:761: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.70 //
GV05agsas_4u:764: māyāmayo māyāvinā yaḥ kṛto nirmitako mantrauṣadhyādibhirniṣpāditaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:765: svapnamāyānirmitakā aṇḍajātayo jīvā yatā jāyante mriyante ca tachā manuṣyādilakṣaṇā avidyamānā eva citta vikalpanāmātrā ityartaḥ //68-70 //
GV05agsas_4u:768: na kaścij jāyate jīvaḥ saṃbhavo 'sya na vidyate /
GV05agsas_4u:769: etat tad uttamaṃ satyaṃ yatra kiñcin na jāyate // MandUpK_4.71 //
GV05agsas_4u:773: uttamaṃ tu paramārthasatyaṃ na kaścijjāyate jīva iti /
GV05agsas_4u:778: cittaṃ nirviṣayaṃ nityam asaṅgaṃ tena kīrtitam // MandUpK_4.72 //
GV05agsas_4u:781: sarvaṃ grāhyagrāhakavaccittaspanditameva dvayaṃ cittaṃ paramārthata ātmaiveti nirviṣayaṃ tena nirviṣayatvena nityamasaṅgaṃ kīrtitam /
GV05agsas_4u:787: nanu nirviṣayatvena cedasaṅgatvaṃ cittasya na niḥsaṅgatā bhavati yasmācchāstā śāstraṃ śiṣyaścetyevamāderviṣayasya vidyamānatvāt /
GV05agsas_4u:794: kalpitā ca sā paramārthapratipatyupāyatvena saṃvṛtiśca sā,
GV05agsas_4u:795: tayā yo 'sti paramārthena nāstyasau na vidyate /
GV05agsas_4u:797: yaśca paratantrābhisaṃvṛtyā paraśāstravyavahāreṇa syātpadārthaḥ sa paramārthato nirūpyamāṇo nāstyeva /
GV05agsas_4u:801: nanu śāstrādīnāṃ saṃvṛtitve 'ja itīyamapi kalpanāṃ saṃvṛtiḥ syāt?
GV05agsas_4u:804: paratantrādiniṣpattyā saṃvṛtyā jāyate tu saḥ // MandUpK_4.74 //
GV05agsas_4u:808: paramārthena nāpyajo yasmātparatantrābhiniṣpattyā paraśāstrasiddhimapekṣya yo 'ja ityuktaḥ sa saṃvṛtyā jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:809: ato 'ja itīyamapi kalpanā paramārthaviṣaye naiva kramata ityarthaḥ //74//
GV05agsas_4u:814: dvayābhāvaṃ sa buddhvaiva nirnimitto na jāyate // MandUpK_4.75 //
GV05agsas_4u:820: mithyābhiniveśamātraṃ ca janmanaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasmāttasmāddvayābhāvaṃ buddhvā nirnimitto nivṛttamithyādvayābhiniveśo yaḥ sa na jāyate //75//
GV05agsas_4u:824: tadā na jāyate cittaṃ hetvabhāve phalaṃ kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.76 //
GV05agsas_4u:827: jātyāśramavihitā aśīrvarjitairanuṣṭhīyamānā dharmā devatvādiprāptihetava uttamāḥ kevalāśca dharmāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:830_1: jānanna labhate na paśyati yathā bālairdṛśyamānaṃ gagane malaṃ vivekī na paśyati
GV05agsas_4u:830_3: na hyasati hetau phalamutpadyate bījādyabhāva iva sasyādi //76 //
GV05agsas_4u:836: ajātasyaiva sarvasya cittadṛśyaṃ hi tadyataḥ // MandUpK_4.77 //
GV05agsas_4u:839: paramārthadarśanena nirastadharmādharmākhyotpattinimittasyānimittasya cittasyeti yā mokṣākhyānutpattiḥ sā sarvadā sarvāvasthāsu samā nirviśeṣādvayā ca /
GV05agsas_4u:841: yasmātprāgapu vijñānāccittadṛśyaṃ tadadvayaṃ janma ca tasmādajātasya sarvasya sarvadā cittasya samādvayaivānutpattirna punaḥ kadācidbhavati kadācidvā na bhavati /
GV05agsas_4u:846: buddhvā nimittatāṃ satyāṃ hetuṃ pṛthag anāpnuvan /
GV05agsas_4u:847: vītaśokaṃ tathākāmam abhayaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_4.78 //
GV05agsas_4u:850_0: animittatāṃ ca satyāṃ paramārtharūpāṃ buddhvā hetuṃ dharmādikāraṇaṃ devādiyoniprāptaye
GV05agsas_4u:854: vastvabhāvaṃ sa budhvaiva niḥsaṅgaṃ vinivartate // MandUpK_4.79 //
GV05agsas_4u:857: yasmād bhūtābhiniveśādasati dvaye dvayāstitvaniścayo 'bhūtābhiniveśastasmādavidyāvyāmoharūpāddhi sadṛśe tadanurūpe taccittaṃ pravartate /
GV05agsas_4u:858: tasya dvayasya vastuno 'bhāvaṃ yadā buddhavāṃstadā tasmānniḥsaṅgo nirapekṣaṃ sadvinivartate 'bhūtābhiniveśaviṣayāt //79//
GV05agsas_4u:862: viṣayaḥ sa hi buddhānāṃ tat sāmyam ajam advayam // MandUpK_4.80 //
GV05agsas_4u:865: nivṛtasya dvaitaviṣayādviṣayāntare cāpravṛttasyābhāvadarśanena cittasya niścalā calanavarjitā brahmasvarūpaiva tadā sthitiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:867: sa hi yasmādviṣayo gocaraḥ paramārthadarśināṃ buddhānāṃ tasmāttatsāmyaṃ paraṃ nirviśeṣamajamadvayaṃ ca //80//
GV05agsas_4u:871: ajam anidram asvapnaṃ prabhātaṃ bhavati svayam /
GV05agsas_4u:872: sakṛdvibhāto hy evaiṣa dharma dhātusvabhāvataḥ // MandUpK_4.81 //
GV05agsas_4u:878: sakṛdvibhātaḥ sadaiva vibhāta ityetadeṣa evaṃlakṣaṇa ātmākhyo dharmo dhātusvabhāvato vastusvabhāvata ityarthaḥ //81//
GV05agsas_4u:882: sukham āvriyate nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vivriyate sadā /
GV05agsas_4u:883: yasya kasya ca dharmasya graheṇa bhagavān asau // MandUpK_4.82 //
GV05agsas_4u:886: yasmādyasya kasyaciddvayavastuno dharmasya graheṇa grahaṇāveśena mithyābhiniviṣṭatayā sukhamāvriyate 'nāyāsenācchādyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:891: ato vedāntairācāryaiśca bahuśa ucyamāno 'pi naiva jñātuṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:896: asti nāstītyādisūkṣmaviṣayā api paṇḍitānāṃ grahā bhagavataḥ paramātmana āvaraṇa eva kimuta mūḍhajanānāṃ buddhilakṣaṇā ityevamarthaṃ pradarśayannāha-
GV05agsas_4u:897: asti nāsty asti nāstīti nāsti nāstīti vā punaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:908: prakāracatuṣṭayasyāpi tairataiścalisthirobhayābhāvaiḥ sadasadādivādī sarvo 'pi bhagavantamāvṛṇotyeva bāliśo 'vivekī /
GV05agsas_4u:909: yadyapi paṇḍito bāliśa eva paramārthatattvānavabodhāckimu svabhāvamūḍho jana ityabhiprāyaḥ //83//
GV05agsas_4u:913: koṭhyaś catasra etās tu grahair yāsāṃ sadā vṛtaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:914: bhagavān ābhir aspṛṣṭo yena dṛṣṭaḥ sa sarvadṛk // MandUpK_4.84 //
GV05agsas_4u:917_0: koṭhyaḥ prāvādukaśāstranirṇayāntā etā uktā asti nāstītyādyāścatasro yāsāṃ koṭīnāṃ
GV05agsas_4u:917_3: ityetadyena muninā dṛṣṭo jñāto vedānteṣvaupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ sa sarvadṛksarvajñaḥ
GV05agsas_4u:920: prāpya sarvajñatāṃ kṛtsnāṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ padam advayam /
GV05agsas_4u:921: anāpannādimadhyāntaṃ kim ataḥ param īhate // MandUpK_4.85 //
GV05agsas_4u:924: prāpyaitāṃ yathoktāṃ kṛtsnāṃ samastāṃ sarvajñatāṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ padaṃ“sa brāhmaṇaḥ“(bṛ.u.3 /
GV05agsas_4u:928: 23) iti śruteḥ ; ādimadhyāntā utpattisthitilayā anāpannā aprāptā yasyādvayasya padasya na vidyante tadanāpannādimadhyāntaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ padam,
GV05agsas_4u:929: tadeva prāpya labdhvā kimataḥ paramasmādātmalābhādūrdhvamīhate ceṣṭate niṣprayojanamityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:934: viprāṇāṃ vinayo hy eṣa śamaḥ prākṛta ucyate /
GV05agsas_4u:935: damaḥ prakṛtidāntatvād evaṃ vidvāñ śamaṃ vrajet // MandUpK_4.86 //
GV05agsas_4u:938: viprāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vinayo vinītatvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ yadetātmasvarūpeṇāvasthānam /
GV05agsas_4u:939: eṣa vinayaḥ śamo 'pyeṣa eva prākṛtaḥ svābhāviko 'kṛtaka ucyate /
GV05agsas_4u:941: evaṃ yathoktaṃ svabhāvopaśāntaṃ brahma vidvāñśamamupaśāntiṃ svābhāvikīṃ brahmasvarūpāṃ vrajed brahmasvarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ //86//
GV05agsas_4u:945: ato mithyādarśanāni tānīti tadyuktibhireva darśayitvā catuṣkoṭivarjitatvādrāhādidoṣānāspadaṃ svabhāvaśāntamadvaitadarśanameva samyagdarśamityupasaṃhṛtam /
GV05agsas_4u:947: savastu sopalambhaṃ ca dvayaṃ laukikam iṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:948: avastu sopalambhaṃ ca śuddhaṃ laukikam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.87 //
GV05agsas_4u:951: savastu saṃvṛtisatā vastunā saha vartata iti savastu,
GV05agsas_4u:952: tathā copalabdhirupalambhastena saha vartata iti sopalbhaṃ ca śāstrādisarvavyavahārāspadaṃ grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇaṃ dvayaṃ laukikaṃ lokādanapetaṃ lokikaṃ jāgaritamityetat /
GV05agsas_4u:955: sopalambhaṃ vastuvadupalambhanamupalambho 'satyapi vastuni tena saha vartata iti sopalambhaṃ ca /
GV05agsas_4u:956: śuddhaṃ kevalaṃ pravibhaktaṃ jāgaritātsthūlāllaukikaṃ sarvaprāṇisādhāraṇatvādiṣyate svapna ityarthaḥ //87//
GV05agsas_4u:959: avastv anupalambhaṃ ca lokottaram iti smṛtam /
GV05agsas_4u:960: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ sadā buddhaiḥ prakīrtitam // MandUpK_4.88 //
GV05agsas_4u:966: sopāyaṃ paramārthatattvaṃ laukikaṃ śuddhalaukikaṃ lokottaraṃ ca krameṇa yena jñānena jñāyate tajjñānam /
GV05agsas_4u:973: jñāne ca trividhe jñeye krameṇa vidite svayam /
GV05agsas_4u:974: sarvajñatā hi sarvatra bhavatīha mahādhiyaḥ // MandUpK_4.89 //
GV05agsas_4u:978: jñeye ca laukikādau trividhe- pūrvaṃ laukikaṃ sthūlam,
GV05agsas_4u:980_0: tathābhāvena lokottaramityevaṃ krameṇa sthānatrayābhāvena paramārthasatye turye 'dvaye
GV05agsas_4u:980_1: 'je 'bhaye vidite svayamevātmasvarūpameva sarvajñatā sarvaścāsau jñaśca sarvajñastadbhāvaḥ sarvajñatā,
GV05agsas_4u:984: na hi paramārthavido jñānodbhavābhibhavau sto yathānyeṣāṃ prāvādukānām //89//
GV05agsas_4u:987: laukikādīnāṃ krameṇa jñeyatvena nirdeśādastitvāśaṅkā paramārthato mā bhūdityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:989: teṣām anyatra vijñeyād upalambhas triṣu smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_4.90 //
GV05agsas_4u:992: heyāni ca laukikādīni trīṇi jāgaritasvapnasuṣuptānyātmanyasattvena rajjvāṃ sarpavaddhātavyānītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:998: teṣāṃ heyādīnāmanyatra vijñeyātparamārthasatyaṃ vijñeyaṃ brahmaikaṃ varjayitvā,
GV05agsas_4u:1000: heyāpyāpakyeṣu triṣvapi smṛto brahmavidbhirna paramārthasatyatā trayāṇāmityarthaḥ //90//
GV05agsas_4u:1005: vidyate na hi nānātvaṃ teṣāṃ kvacana kiñcanaḥ // MandUpK_4.91 //
GV05agsas_4u:1008: prakṛtyā svabhāvata ākāśavadākāśatulyāḥ sūkṣmanirañjanasarvagatatvaiḥ sarve dharmā ātmāno jñeyāṃ mumukṣubhiranādayo nityāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1009: bahuvacanakṛtabhedāśaṅkāṃ nirākurvannāha- kvacana kiñcana kindidaṇumātramapi teṣāṃ na vidyate nānātvamiti //91//
GV05agsas_4u:1012: jñeyatāpi dharmāṇāṃ saṃvṛtyaiva na paramārthata ityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:1014: yasyaivaṃ bhavati kṣāntiḥ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // MandUpK_4.92 //
GV05agsas_4u:1017: yasmādādau buddhā ādibuddhāḥ prakṛtyaiva svabhāvata eva yathā nityaprakāśasvarūpaḥ savitaivaṃ nityabodhasvarūpā ityarthaḥ sarve dharmāḥ sarva ātmānaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1018: na ca teṣāṃ niścayaḥ kartavyo nityaniścitasvarūpā ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1020_0: yasya mumukṣorevaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa sarvadā bodhaniścayanirapekṣatātmārthaṃ parārthaṃ
GV05agsas_4u:1020_1: vā yathā savitā nityaṃ prakāśāntaranirapekṣaḥ svārthaṃ paramārthaṃ cetyevaṃ bhavati
GV05agsas_4u:1020_2: kṣāntirbodhakartavyatānirapekṣatā sarvadā svātmani sa amṛtatvāyāmṛtabhāvāya kalpate
GV05agsas_4u:1025: sarve dharmāḥ samābhinnā ajaṃ sāmyaṃ viśāradam // MandUpK_4.93 //
GV05agsas_4u:1028: yasmādādiśāntā nityameva śāntā anutpannā ajāśca prakṛtyaiva sunirvṛtāḥ suṣṭhūparatasvabhāvā ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1030: ajaṃ sāmyaṃ viśāradaṃ viśuddhamātmatatvaṃ yasmāttasmācchāntirmokṣo vā nāsti kartavya ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1034: ye yathoktaṃ paramārthatattvaṃ pratipannāsta evākṛpaṇā loke kṛpaṇā evānya ityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:1035: vaiśāradyaṃ tu vai nāsti bhede vicaratāṃ sadā /
GV05agsas_4u:1036: bhedanimnāḥ pṛthagvādās tasmāt te kṛpaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_4.94 //
GV05agsas_4u:1040: pṛdagvādāḥ pṛthaṅnānā vastvityevaṃ vadanaṃ yeṣāṃ te pṛthagvādā dvaitina ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1042: yasmādvaiśāradyaṃ viśuddhirnāsti teṣāṃ bhede vicaratāṃ dvaitamārge 'vidyākalpite sarvadā vartamānānāmityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1047: aje sāmye tu ye kecid bhaviṣyanti suniścitāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1048: te hi loke mahājñānās tac ca loko na gāhate // MandUpK_4.95 //
GV05agsas_4u:1051: aje sāmye paramārthatattva evameveti ye kecitstrāyadayo 'pi suniścitā bhaviṣyanti cetta eva hi loke mahājñānā niratiśaya tattvaviṣayajñānā ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1052: tacca teṣāṃ vartma teṣāṃ viditaṃ paramārthatattvaṃ sāmānyabuddhiranyo loko na gāhate nāvatariti na viṣayīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1060: ajeṣv ajam asaṃkrāntaṃ dharmeṣu jñānam iṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:1061: yato na kramate jñānam asaṅgaṃ tena kīrtitam // MandUpK_4.96 //
GV05agsas_4u:1064: ajeṣvanutpanneṣvacaleṣu dharmeṣvātmasvajamacalaṃ ca jñānamiṣyate savitarīvauṣṇyaṃ prakāśaśca yatastasmādasaṃkrāntamarthāntare jñānamajamiṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:1065: yasmānna kramater'thāntare jñānaṃ tena kāraṇenāsaṅgaṃ tatkīrtitamākāśakalpamityuktam //96//
GV05agsas_4u:1072_0: ito 'nyeṣāṃ vādināmaṇumātre 'pi vaidharmye vastuni bahirantarvā jāyamāna utpādyamāne
GV05agsas_4u:1072_1: 'vipaścito 'vivekino 'saṅgatā asaṅgatvaṃ sadā nāsti kimuta vaktayavyamāvaraṇacyutirbandhanāśo nāstīti //97 //
GV05agsas_4u:1078: ādau buddhās tathā muktā budhyanta iti nāyakāḥ // MandUpK_4.98 //
GV05agsas_4u:1081: alabdhāvaraṇāḥ- alabdhamaprāptamāvaraṇamavidyādibandhanaṃ yeṣāṃ te dharmā alabdhāvaraṇā bandhanarahitā ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1082: prakṛtinirmalāḥ svabhāvaśuddhā ādau buddhāstathā muktā yasmānnityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1084: nāyakāḥ svāminaḥ samarthā boddhuṃ bodhaśaktimatsvabhāvā ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1085: yathā nityaprakāśasvarūpo 'pi savitā prakāśata ityucyate yathā vā nityanivṛttagatayo 'pi nityameva śailāstiṣṭhantītyucyate tadvat //98//
GV05agsas_4u:1088: kramate na hi buddhasya jñānaṃ dharmeṣu tāyinaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1089: sarve dharmās tathā jñānaṃ naitad buddhena bhāṣitam // MandUpK_4.99 //
GV05agsas_4u:1092: yasmānna hi kramate buddhasya paramārthadarśino jñānaṃ viṣayāntareṣu dharmeṣu dharmasaṃsthaṃ savitarīva prabhā,
GV05agsas_4u:1096: sarve dharmā ātmāno 'pi tathā jñānavadevākāśakalpatvānna kramante kvacidapyarthāntara ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1097: yadādāvupanyastaṃ jñānenākāśakalpenetyādi tadidamākāśakalpasya tāyino buddhasya tadananyatvādākāśakalpaṃ jñānaṃ na kramaye kvacidapyarthāntare /
GV05agsas_4u:1108: buddhvā padam anānātvaṃ namaskurmo yathābalam // MandUpK_4.100 //
GV05agsas_4u:1114: ajaṃ sāmyaṃ viśāradam īdṛkpadamanānātvaṃ nānātvavarjitaṃ buddhvāvagamya tadbhūtāḥ santo namaskurmastasmai padāya,
GV05agsas_4u:1116: iti śaṅkarabhagavataḥ kṛtau gauḍapādīyāgamaśāstravivaraṇe 'lātaśāntyākhyaṃ caturthaṃ prakaraṇam //
